Package org.drools.agent

Interface Summary
AgentEventListener This interface is used to provide callback style logging for the agents async events.
FileLoader This interface is mostly provided so a DRL provider can live in drools-compiler, without it, we would have circular references.
IHttpClient A nicely mockable Http client interface.
 

Class Summary
DirectoryScanner This will scan a directory for files to watch for a change.
FileScanner This will monitor a file to a binary package.
HttpClientImpl  
PackageProvider All sources of packages must implement this.
RuleAgent This manages a single rulebase, based on the properties given.
RuleBaseAgentCache  
URLScanner
